column2: Diced grilled ham, crimini mushrooms, tomatoes, onions, green peppers and American cheese.
Pork sausage links, Applewood smoked bacon, smoked ham, caramelized onions and cheddar atop an omelet stuffed with more of the same, plus crispy tots.
A Southwestern omelet stuffed with chorizo, seasoned potatoes, black bean corn relish and Pepper Jack cheese. Topped with poblano queso and tortilla straws; served with fresh avocado.

An egg white omelet filled with turkey sausage, sweet red onions, summer squash, zucchini, tender red bell peppers, crimini mushrooms, spinach and Mediterranean Feta. Served with fresh fruit and dry whole wheat toast. (570 cal)
Filled with diced ham, onions, green peppers, American cheese, cheese sauce and crispy hash browns. Topped with all of the same!
A Belgian Waffle dusted with powdered sugar for the perfect dash of sweetness.
Three buttermilk pancakes topped with sweet glazed strawberries, whipped topping and powdered sugar.
Two slices of thick-cut Brioche bread dipped in our signature French toast batter, grilled and sprinkled with powdered sugar.
Two buttermilk pancakes loaded with juicy blueberries and topped with freshly sliced bananas. Served with scrambled egg whites and two turkey sausage patties. No sides. (660 calories)
Three eggs, three Applewood smoked bacon strips, three sausage links, two made-from-scratch buttermilk pancakes, two slices of French toast and crispy hash browns.
Two eggs, two Applewood smoked bacon strips and three buttermilk pancakes.
Three eggs, four buttermilk pancakes, crispy hash browns and four Applewood smoked bacon strips.
Our 10 oz. maple-glazed USDA Choice pork chop served with two eggs, crispy hash browns and choice of three buttermilk pancakes, fresh baked Mammoth Muffin® or buttered toast.
Tender USDA Choice steak medallions with grilled crimini mushrooms and onions. Served with two eggs, crispy hash browns and choice of three buttermilk pancakes, Mammoth Muffin® or buttered toast.

Two eggs, smoked sausage, two Applewood smoked bacon strips and two sausage links. Served with crispy hash browns and choice of three buttermilk pancakes, fresh baked Mammoth Muffin® or buttered toast.
A fried chicken fillet and American cheese inside two fresh baked biscuits topped with warm, country-style cream gravy.
Our delicious sausage patties inside two fresh baked biscuits, all topped with warm, country-style cream gravy and American cheese.
Pork sausage, Applewood smoked bacon, smoked ham, American cheese and cream gravy with two eggs served over crispy smashed tots.
Fresh from the garden. Fresh spinach, onions, crimini mushrooms and oven-roasted tomatoes, served with egg whites over homestyle seasoned potatoes. (410 calories)
Grilled ham, crimini mushrooms, green peppers, tomatoes, onions and American cheese with two eggs served over homestyle seasoned potatoes.
Two basted eggs, fresh avocado, Applewood smoked bacon, oven-roasted tomatoes, Pepper Jack cheese, creamy hollandaise and garlic seasoning atop an English muffin.
The tried-and-true favorite. Two basted eggs, grilled ham and creamy hollandaise atop an English muffin.
Crispy fries topped with 100% Angus ground beef, American cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, sweet red onions, queso and fried pickle chips.
A double stacked cheesy tortilla topped with chorizo sausage, green peppers, onions, Pepper Jack cheese, salsa and sour cream.

A fresh-Mex salad with blackened chicken, black bean corn relish, American cheese and fresh avocado on garden greens. Garnished with crunchy tortilla straws and served with a zesty Chipotle Ranch dressing.
Butterball® roasted turkey, Applewood bacon, diced tomatoes, Feta cheese, avocado and hard-boiled egg on fresh greens with choice of dressing. (510 calories)
Crispy chicken strips, sweet red onions, red peppers, tomatoes, American cheese, Applewood smoked bacon and Honey Mustard dressing on fresh garden greens.
Two Angus beef patties, crispy onion rings, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, sweet red onions, pickles and zesty Thousand Island on grilled Parmesan sourdough bread.
Grill masters, rejoice. A blend of A.1.® and BBQ sauce, caramelized onions, Pepper Jack cheese, black pepper bacon and Onion Tanglers®
Candied jalapeños, poblano queso, spicy Sriracha bacon, cheddar cheese, smashed tots, lettuce, tomato, pickles and sweet red onions.
Two Angus beef patties, sautéed onions, American cheese and pickles on grilled Vienna bread.
Crispy seasoned hash browns, sweet maple bacon, cheddar cheese and a fried egg.
Cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, sweet red onions, pickles and Perkins® signature sauce.
Crispy chicken strips, Applewood smoked bacon and melted Pepper Jack cheese with Ranch dressing served on grilled sourdough bread.
A blend of smoked pulled chicken, red grapes, celery and walnuts on a bed of leaf lettuce, served open face on a French roll.
Sliced oven-roasted Butterball® turkey, fresh avocado, Applewood smoked bacon, tomato, balsamic aioli and lettuce on whole wheat bread. (image represents a half sandwich)
Sliced roast beef, lettuce, red onion, tomato, Swiss cheese and a balsamic aioli on a French roll. (image represents a half sandwich)
Smoked, pulled chicken drizzled with a sweet BBQ sauce. Topped with crispy Onion Tanglers® and creamy cheese sauce served on a French roll.
A tender, maple-glazed, 10 oz. USDA choice pork chop drizzled with a delectable maple butter sauce. Served with two dinner sides.
Our crispy, all-white meat chicken breast strips are served with Honey Mustard dipping sauce and choice of two dinner sides.
Oven-roasted slices of turkey breast served on our seasoned sage dressing and topped with hearty turkey gravy. Served with tangy cranberry sauce and choice of two dinner sides.

Garlic-seasoned tilapia topped with grilled shrimp and drizzled with garlic butter. Served over herb rice pilaf with grilled asparagus. Also available Cajun-seasoned for an extra kick! (460-550 calories)
Our new, right-sized Chicken Pot Pie served with a fresh garden salad plus a FREE slice of our fresh baked pie! Available only after 11 a.m.

Lemon herb, cage-free chicken breast, grilled and topped with sautéed garlic crimini mushrooms. Served over herb rice pilaf with grilled asparagus and drizzled with a warm White Balsamic Vinaigrette. (620 calories)

Atlantic salmon with sautéed crimini mushrooms, sweet red onions, zucchini, summer squash, tender red bell peppers and oven-roasted tomatoes. Served on fresh spinach and herb rice pilaf with warm White Balsamic Vinaigrette.
Black bean and sweet corn relish topped with Cajun pulled chicken,sour cream, tortilla straws, American cheese and fresh avocado, in a seasoned broth. Served over herb rice pilaf.
Smoked pulled chicken with fresh steamed broccoli, oven-roasted tomatoes and Applewood smoked bacon. Drizzled with creamy poblano queso and served over herb rice pilaf.
USDA Choice steak tips with tender red bell peppers, caramelized onions, crimini mushrooms and a rich beef gravy served over homestyle seasoned potatoes.

Loaded with hand-sliced bananas and topped with real whipped cream and chopped walnuts.

Seasonal ripe berries. No sugar added.
Tangy lemon filling, light and fluffy.
Juicy sweet apples baked fresh inside a golden flaky crust.
Sweet and tangy cherries baked inside a golden double crust.
A delectable treat of our fresh baked chocolate chip cookie, vanilla ice cream, hot fudge, whipped topping, chocolate chips and a cherry.
Fresh baked daily and topped with rich cream cheese icing.
Hand-dipped with rich premium ice cream. Vanilla, Chocolate or Strawberry.
